data.name: Creator.PremiumBadgeIconAccessibilityText
data.comment: This is text that will be read by screen readers when the premium badge is present next to a creators name Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: GroupNameChangeWithVerifiedBadge
data.comment: A warning to a user if they try to change their group name that they will lose the verified badge. Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: ThisActionWillRemoveTheVerifiedBadge
data.comment: Warning displayed to users in a confirmation modal that taking this action will remove their verified badge. Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: TwoSVWithVerifiedBadge
data.value: 2단계 인증을 비활성화하면 인증된 배지를 잃게 되며 계정 보안이 취약해집니다. 정말 계속할까요?
data.comment: A warning displayed to users telling them turning off 2FA verification will result in them losing their verified badges Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: UsernameChangeWithVerifiedBadge
data.value: 중요: 이 변경을 진행하면 인증된 배지를 잃게 됩니다.\n\n원래의 계정 생성 날짜는 새 사용자 이름으로 이전됩니다.
data.comment: Text warning a user if they change their username they will lose the verified badge Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: VerifiedBadgeInfo
data.value: 이 배지는 배지의 소유자가 실제 유명 제작자, 브랜드 또는 공인임을 증명합니다.
data.comment: Info that will be displayed in a modal if the verified badge is clicked Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: VerifiedBadgeInfoLink
data.comment: Text for a link to “Learn More” about Verified Badges Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: action.close
data.comment: A button that can be clicked to close a modal Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: 2SVWithVerifiedBadge
data.comment: A warning displayed to users telling them turning off 2FA verification will result in them losing their verified badges Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by ccui@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: Creator.VerifiedBadgeIconAccessibilityText
data.comment: Text that will be read by screen readers when a verified badge is present next to a name. Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: DisplayNameChangeWithVerifiedBadge
data.value: 중요: 이 변경을 진행하면 인증된 배지를 잃게 됩니다.\n\n표시 이름은 7일에 한 번만 변경할 수 있습니다.
data.comment: Text explaining to the user if they change their display name they will lose their Verified Badge Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by DLOUIE@ROBLOX.COM Modified by bdeng@roblox.com

data.name: VerifiedBadgeInfoTitle
data.comment: Text that will be displayed as the title for a modal that gives the user more information about what the Verified Badge is Created by dminnerly@roblox.com Modified by czhang@roblox.com Created by dminnerly@roblox.com Modified by bdeng@roblox.com
